work.summary: Fixed reported issues on existing mobile applications for iOS. Monitor and assign development tasks ensuring on time delivery and satisfactory output.

projects.name: WHS Monitor
projects.description: WHS Monitor Mobile provides access to a suite of features to manage, record and report on all aspects of an organisation's health and safety obligations including incident reporting, risk management, audits and inspections, asset maintenance and chemical management.

projects.name: Book it
projects.description: A booking platform for service providers. The app displays the location and schedule of service providers. Users can set an appointment, and receive notifications for upcoming appointments.

projects.name: Gava
projects.description: A social media crowdgifting platform. The application allows users to launch campaigns and gifts, where other users can contribute to purchase the gift or donation for the campaign.

work.summary: Deployed to Samsung Electronics R&D Philippines. Debugged Samsung Mobile Print and Samsung Cloud Print reducing reported crashes and removing unexpected application behaviors. Optimized Samsung Mobile Print application reducing user waiting time on loading processes and improving overall user experience. Implemented new features for Samsung Mobile Print and adapted autolayout for the next major version of the application.

projects.name: Samsung Printing Applications (Samsung Mobile Print/ Samsung Cloud Print)
projects.description: A set of iOS applications for interfacing Samsung printers to allow printing, scanning, faxing, copying on a Samsung using iOS device.

work.summary: Redesigned existing but unpublished iOS application and added new features like requesting quotes via email, and successfully submitted the application to the App Store; Get Certified application. Overhauled and implemented a mocked up application for rating PMC store staff, adding features to add new staff and generate and save reports, also rebranded to be released to the App Store; Customer Experience Checklist application

projects.name: Get Certified
projects.description: A catalogue application for training services offered by the training center. Also allows requesting for quotation via email in app.

projects.name: Customer Experience Checklist
projects.description: A rating application for assessing skills of store staff and frontliners. The application presents a set of questions for each category to evaluate the staff, and accumulates score to get average rating. Also allows report generation, which can be exported to PDF file.

projects.name: Colour Chase
projects.description: A promotional game to showcase iOS development capabilities for the training center, and to encourage people to take the offered iOS app development training course.
